title: Population data sets — population
text: data sets contain population data Kansas City, Missouri, sourced US Census Bureau's American Community Survey (ACS). 1-year ACS data sets, summary level Kansas City . 5-year ACS data sets, available summary levels include city, census tract, ZIP code tabulation area (ZCTA). Data sets downloaded data.census.gov using tidycensus package. Tables... variables... See Guidance Data Users information census.gov use ACS data.

title: City boundary shapefiles — shp-city
text: TIGER/Line shapefiles city Kansas City, Missouri, downloaded census.gov using tigris package. US Census Bureau uses Global Coordinate System North American Datum 1983 (GCS NAD83/EPSG: 4269).

what: ZIP code tabulation area (ZCTA) shapefiles — shp-zcta
title: ZIP code tabulation area (ZCTA) shapefiles — shp-zcta
text: TIGER/Line shapefiles ZCTAs Kansas City, Missouri, downloaded census.gov using tigris package. US Census Bureau uses Global Coordinate System North American Datum 1983 (GCS NAD83/EPSG: 4269). 2010-2019, variable names ended "10". Since 2020, variable names end "20".
